author: swang373
body:
Updates to the EMTF firmware broke the monitor elements which relied on the track sector variables. This is currently patched such that the sector value is retrieved from the EventHeader, though updates are expected to be made to the unpacker that will affect this behaviour later on.

The CSC chamber numbering schemes are now correctly implemented with respect to the geometry outlined in "CMS IN-2007/024".
title: EMTF DQM Update and Bugfix
